properties.Observatio: There is a about 2.0 acres reserve around the spring. Olugama community  water project is being implemented using Spring water.
properties.Descriptio:
Plant 30 no of Kumbuk trees-Around spring

Supplying of Kumbuk/ Mee/ Godapara/ Kaduru/ Aththikka/ Wal Del/ Kekuna seedlings [to be planted in 3.5m x 3.5m grid]

Supplying of NPK fertilizer [0.10kg/plant]

Ground preparation & maintenance [7 L/days per 10

properties.Observatio: There is a 0.75 acre reserve above the lake, and appala are currently grown there.Spring water flows along a stream and collect the lake. People live around the reserve.
